Creates a new role with optional initial permissions and assignments

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name","ouId"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the role"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional description of the role"},"ouId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the organization unit this role belongs to"},"permissions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["resourceServerId","permissions"],"properties":{"resourceServerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the resource server these permissions belong to"},"permissions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of permission strings for this resource server"}},"title":"ResourcePermissions"},"description":"Optional list of initial permissions grouped by resource server"},"assignments":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","type"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the user or group being assigned"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["user","group"],"description":"Type of entity being assigned (user or group)"}},"title":"AssignmentInput"},"description":"Optional list of initial user and group assignments"}},"title":"CreateRoleRequest"},"example":{"name":"front-desk-agent","description":"Front desk agent role with booking and customer management permissions","ouId":"a839f4bd-39dc-4eaa-b5cc-210d8ecaee87","permissions":[{"resourceServerId":"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6","permissions":["create_reservation","view_reservation","update_reservation","check_in_guest","check_out_guest"]},{"resourceServerId":"7b8c9d0e-1f2a-3b4c-5d6e-7f8a9b0c1d2e","permissions":["process_payment","view_payment","view_customer_profile","update_customer_profile"]}],"assignments":[{"type":"user","id":"7a4b1f8e-5c69-4b60-9232-2b0aaf65ef3c"},{"type":"group","id":"6b1e7b8d-7e19-41eb-8fa2-c0ee5bb67a94"}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
